messages.subject: Just a cute kid remark
messages.msgSnippet: I was at the dentist this afternoon with my 6yo for his checkup. New hygenist ... typical banter ... Did you go to school today?  He replied: I homeschool .
messages.messageBody:
I was at the dentist this afternoon with my 6yo for his checkup.

New hygenist ... typical banter ... "Did you go to school today?" He replied: "I homeschool". Then the typical comments to me ... "Wow" and "you must be very organized" to which I just smiled. Then with a little giggle she asked him "Is your teacher tough?" to which he promptly replied "No, I'm never wrong!"

Too funny!

Pam L


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
